law.text: The provisions of KRS 304.26-030 and 304.26-040 and subsection (1) of KRS 304.26-050, do not apply to foreign or domestic arbitrage transactions unless made in contravention of such rules and regulations as the commissioner may adopt in order to carry out the purposes of this subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1372, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 26, sec. 7, effective June 18, 1970.
